officialTitle: Vasopressor Prophylaxis After Spinal Anesthesia: A Dose Finding Study
inclusionCriteria:
* full term singleton pregnant women
* Scheduled for elective Cesarean Delivery
* Aged between 18 and 40 years
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 40 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Cardiac morbidities
* Hypertensive disorders of pregnancy,
* Peripartum bleeding
* Baseline systolic blood pressure (SBP) \< 100 mmHg
* Body mass index \> 35
